zh.title: 雪崩币/美元技术分析：[震荡整理，关注支撑位]
zh.content:
当前，雪崩币（AVAX）在12.5061美元附近交易，24小时内小幅下跌0.39%。从价格走势来看，AVAX在12.6432美元的高点和12.5042美元的低点之间震荡整理，显示出市场的犹豫与不确定性。若价格持续在此区间波动，可能会导致短期内的横盘整理。

在技术指标方面，虽然RSI数据缺失，但MACD显示出负值（-0.10469249），表明当前市场处于弱势状态，卖方压力较大。同时，20日简单移动平均线（SMA）在12.67767美元附近，显示出短期阻力位。若价格突破这一水平，可能会引发更多的买盘。

支撑位方面，当前关键支撑位在12.5042美元附近，若价格跌破该水平，可能会导致更深程度的回调。投资者需密切关注此位置的表现，以评估进一步走势的可能性。若维持在该支撑位之上，则仍有反弹的机会。

交易建议方面，建议投资者保持观望，待价格明确突破12.6432美元的阻力位后再考虑买入。同时，若价格跌破12.5042美元支撑位，则需谨慎评估持仓风险。灵活运用止损策略，以应对市场波动。

en.title: Avalanche vs US Dollar Technical Analysis
en.content:
The current price of Avalanche (AVAX) against the US Dollar stands at 12.5061, reflecting a slight decrease of 0.39% over the past 24 hours. This modest decline indicates a consolidation phase, as the price struggles to maintain momentum above the critical psychological level of $12.50. The recent high of 12.6432 serves as a potential resistance point, while the low of 12.5042 illustrates near-term support. Observing this range will be crucial for traders looking to gauge the asset's next move.

The absence of the Relative Strength Index (RSI) makes it challenging to determine overbought or oversold conditions. However, the MACD shows a value of -0.10469249, indicating bearish momentum. This suggests that sellers may have the upper hand in the short term. Traders should watch for any potential crossover events in the MACD, which could signal a shift in momentum. A continued downtrend below the SMA(20) of 12.67767 would reinforce bearish sentiment, urging caution among long positions.

Support levels appear to be forming around the recent low of 12.5042, while the SMA(20) at 12.67767 could act as a dynamic resistance level. A break below the support level might trigger further selling pressure, exposing AVAX to a deeper correction. Conversely, if the price can reclaim the SMA(20), it may attract buyers and pave the way for a retest of the resistance at 12.6432. Traders should remain vigilant for any breakout or breakdown signals.

In light of the current market conditions, a cautious approach is recommended. Day traders might consider short positions if the price falls below $12.50, targeting the next support level. Alternatively, those with a longer-term view could look for entry points on dips, should the price stabilize above the SMA(20). Keeping a close watch on volume and momentum indicators will be essential in making informed trading decisions.
